Code: EXEC SQL SELECT COD_EMPRESA, NUM_APOLICE, NRENDOS, NRPARCEL, VLPRMTOT, VLACRESCIMO, SITUACAO, DTMOVTO, DTVENCTO, COD_USUARIO, TIMESTAMP, value(NRTIT,0), value(DT_NOVENCTO,date('0001-01-01')), value(DT_CANCPREV,date('0001-01-01')), NUM_LOTE, value(dat_lote,date('0001-01-01')) FROM seguros.v0parcela_devedor WHERE num_apolice = :NUM_APOLICE AND nrendos = :NRENDOS AND nrparcel = :NRPARCEL END SQL
